snippet.title: "Crimzon Clover - World EXplosion" on Nintendo Switch / Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Exploding onto the Nintendo eShop worldwide October 29, 2020!
NA: https://www.nintendo.com/en_US/games/detail/crimzon-clover-world-explosion-switch/
EU: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Crimzon-Clover-World-EXplosion-1860357.html

Degica Games is proud to announce that hit shoot-em-up PC title Crimzon Clover - World Ignition is about to see its fuse run down and get blown up into the newly rebalanced and upgraded Crimzon Clover - World EXplosion. What's more, this updated edition of the Crimzon Clover experience is making its way to the Nintendo Switch platform for the first time! It will be available for digital download in the North American, Japanese, and PAL region Nintendo eShop on October 29th, with a Steam update sometime thereafter.

If you've never experienced Crimzon Clover before, now's your chance to see the formula at its most refined, with a whole new "ARRANGE" version that allows you to power-up your ship through stacking upgrades, shoot bullets right out of the sky, dodge revenge shots from defeated enemies, and more! 

Prepare yourself for an insatiable rain of bullets, bombs, and beams in Crimzon Clover - World EXplosion! From Japanese indie developers Yotsubane and Adventure Planning Service, this unique top-down shooter, inspired by the golden arcade era of the genre, is a wild ride you won't want to miss out on!
